mcq.statement: Which of the following is an incorrect comparison between tropical rainforests and temperate grasslands regarding the decomposition of organic matter?

options.a: Decomposition of organic matter is faster in tropical rainforests due to higher temperatures and humidity.
options.b: Temperate grasslands have slower decomposition rates compared to tropical rainforests due to cooler temperatures.
options.c: Tropical rainforests accumulate more organic matter on the forest floor than temperate grasslands.
options.d: Decomposition in temperate grasslands is slower because of lower microbial activity.
